channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Caldera Forms – More Than Contact Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Caldera Forms – More Than Contact Forms

item.title: CVE-2021-24896|2024-08-03T19:49:13.968Z -- unknown -- caldera%20forms%20%E2%80%93%20more%20than%20contact%20forms
item.description: The Caldera Forms WordPress plugin before 1.9.5 does not sanitise and escape the Form Name before outputting it in attributes, which could allow high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
